mapper.select: SELECT TB.BOARD_ID AS boardId , TB.TITLE AS title , TB.CONTENTS AS contents , TB.REGIST_ID AS registId , GROUP_CONCAT(TBT.TAG) AS tagList FROM T_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN T_BOARD_TAG TBT ON TB.BOARD_ID = TBT.BOARD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TB.DELETE_YN = FALSE GROUP BY TB.BOARD_ID, TB.TITLE, TB.CONTENTS, TB.REGIST_ID, TB.REGIST_DATE ORDER BY TB.BOARD_ID DESC

SELECT TB.BOARD_ID AS boardId , TB.TITLE AS title , TB.CONTENTS AS contents , TB.REGIST_ID AS registId , GROUP_CONCAT(TBT.TAG) AS tagList FROM T_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN T_BOARD_TAG TBT ON TB.BOARD_ID = TBT.BOARD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TB.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND TB.DELETE_YN = FALSE GROUP BY TB.BOARD_ID, TB.TITLE, TB.CONTENTS, TB.REGIST_ID, TB.REGIST_DATE ORDER BY TB.BOARD_ID DESC
